title: The L Word - Season 6 (gremster)
description:
Season 6, Episode 1: Long Night's Journey Into Day
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½18 January 2009
Shane tries to deal with her betrayal to Jenny as they both attempt to figure out their feelings for one another as Shane awkwardly tries to apologize to Jenny who threatens to evict Shane from her house. Meanwhile, Bette and Tina get anxious when Angelica comes down with a fever which gradually gets worse. Alice and Tasha cannot decide whether to break up or stay together since their different views on life strain their romance to the breaking point. Elsewhere, Helena and Kit celebrate after taking over the SheBar nightclub and re-name the place, 'HIT!'.
	
Season 6, Episode 2: Least Likely
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½25 January 2009
While Niki is enraged by Jenny's vindictive way of leading her on and then dumping her, Bette encounters an old friend from college, named Kelly Wentworth, whom was her first lesbian lover, which makes Tina question how much she trusts Bette. The revenge-seeking Jodi continues to frustrate and taunt Bette. Joyce asks Phyllis to marry her, to which she says "yes". Meanwhile, Max receives the most devastating news a female-to-male transitioning person can receive: she/he is four months pregnant. Elsewhere, Tasha and Alice attend couples counseling, where they wonder whether or not they should stay together. Helena encounters her former flame Dylan Moreland, apparently out of the closet, in the Hit! club, and does not hesitate to reveal her anger for Dylan's past betrayal. When Shane gives up on asking for Jenny's forgiveness, Jenny says she loves her... and they kiss.
	
Season 6, Episode 3: LMFAO
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½1 February 2009
Alice walks in on Jenny and Shane after their night of passion, and naturally does not hesitate to gossip about it to everyone she knows before they have a chance to explain. Meanwhile, Tina gets into trouble when the film negatives for the movie 'The Girls' (which the producers changed from "Lez Girls"), have been stolen from the studio and Tina gets blamed because of her frustration over the movie's new ending. Tina thinks Jenny stole them, but Jenny denies it and even proves it since she not permitted on the studio grounds anymore. Bette continues to have problems at work with Jodi harassing her, while Joyce and Phyllis announce their engagement to everyone. Elsewhere, Alice makes a decision which could change her media career.
	
Season 6, Episode 4: Leaving Los Angeles
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½8 February 2009
Dylan approaches Tina to ask for her help to get back together with Helena. But the rest of the girls do not trust Dylan in which Tasha and Alice take it upon themselves to play matchmaker by setting up Helena with a potently new girlfriend, named Jamie. Meanwhile, Bette and Tina travel to Las Vegas, Nevada to meet with a potential birth mother of the child they play to adopt as a sibling for Angelina. Elsewhere, Max and Tom have trouble dealing with the unexpected pregnancy. While Jenny and Shane's newfound romance continues on strong, Bette's fidelity is compromised by Kelly Wentworth.
	
Season 6, Episode 5: Litmus Test
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½15 February 2009
Desperate to be recognized again, Jenny manages to write and sell another movie script which turns out to steal ideas that Shane had suggested to Jenny. Meanwhile, Bette and Kelly make business plans for the adoption. Alice and Tasha realize that they are having a third-wheel-crush on Jamie. Despite the girls protesting profusely, Helena plans to go out on a date with Dylan. To test Dylan's character, the girls set up a trap but need Niki Stevens' help to pull it off.
	
Season 6, Episode 6: Lactose Intolerant
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½22 February 2009
Jenny throws a baby shower for a overwhelmed Max. But during the party, Jenny, being the nihilist person she is, spills the beans to Dylan about the girls hiring Niki to seduce her as a test to Helena's loyalty, which causes Dylan to get upset and Helena to go crazy. Meanwhile, Bette and Tina attempt to find ways to work around the Nevada state adoption law. While Tina flies to New York on a new movie project for her studio, Bette and Kelly throw an opening party at the art gallery. Kit meets a handsome stranger but doesn't warm up to his advances. Elsewhere, Alice, Tasha, and Jamie spend increasing amounts of time together which begins to take a toll on Alice and Tasha. Also, Shane desires more freedom from Jenny's clinging possessiveness.
Kit watches the tape of Bette and Kelly.
See all videos (2) Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» 	
Season 6, Episode 7: Last Couple Standing
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½1 March 2009
The girls partake in the annual 24-hour Los Angeles Gay & Lesbian Center's dance marathon. Rumors fly about Tasha and Alice's relationship troubles over Jamie playing both of them against each other. Tina reveals that she may be moving to New York. Meanwhile, the Hit!'s MC, Sunset Boulevard, makes a shocking revelation to Kit. When Bette & Tina go to the bus stop to pick up the potential birth mother for the child they want to adopt, she's a no-show.
	
Season 6, Episode 8: Last Word
Original Air DateÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½8 March 2009
What starts out as a celebration of friendship quickly ends in a web of betrayal and deceit; the girls find themselves being investigated about Jenny's untimely death by Sergeant Duffy.
